photos.title: Together on the Steps
photos.description: Ask the models to sit on the steps with the man hugging the woman from behind, creating a cozy and romantic atmosphere.

photos.title: Back Hugs
photos.description: Place the woman in front of the man and ask him to hug her from behind, adding elements of tenderness and care to the shot.

photos.title: Standing Together by the Fountain
photos.description: Position the couple standing together by the fountain, slightly leaning towards each other to create an elegant and harmonious look.

photos.title: Walking in the City
photos.description: Ask the couple to walk hand in hand in the city, creating a sense of movement and dynamism in the frame.

photos.title: Breakfast Together
photos.description: Place the couple at a table in a caf√©, looking at each other and smiling, creating an intimate and cozy atmosphere.

photos.title: Walk by the Landmark
photos.description: Ask the couple to walk near a famous landmark, interacting with each other and smiling.

photos.title: Romantic Gaze
photos.description: Position the couple facing each other, looking at each other with love and tenderness.

photos.title: Dancing Together
photos.description: Ask the couple to take a dance pose, holding hands and looking into each other's eyes.

photos.title: Hug with Closed Eyes
photos.description: Ask the man to hug the woman from behind, and for her to close her eyes and smile, creating an atmosphere of trust and peace.

photos.title: Romantic Hugs in Front of Building
photos.description: Position the couple in front of a beautiful building, hugging each other and looking at the camera with a smile.
